section.title: Amazon Settings
section.para: If you choose Amazon as your authentication mode, required parameters are exposed under Amazon Primary AWS Account Settings for IAM. Be sure to validate your setting before saving them.

listitem.para: Type in an Access Key provided by your Amazon account.
Type in a Secret Key provided by your Amazon account.

section.para: Users logging into CloudForms Management Engine with Amazon authentication enter their own IAM Access Key as the username and IAM Secret Key as the password. Amazon users must be added as a CloudForms Management Engine user or belong to an IAM user group added to the list of CloudForms Management Engine groups.
